choices.C: Configure exclusions to filter out unnecessary registry entries.
choices.A: Configure exclusions to filter out unnecessary folders.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
I think the correct answer is A. Changing the save path will not do anything to reduce the size of the profile that is causing the performance issues. However, excluding unnecessary folders such and "temp files" in the profile configuration will have an effect on the size of user profiles and can help performance.

Selected Answer: A
I think correct answer is A

questions.question_text:
An administrator is leveraging PCoIP protocol in their Horizon environment and wants to distribute clients to end users that have the smallest footprint possible with no local operating system.
Which client type satisfies these requirements?

Drag and drop the VMware Horizon deployment type on the left to the solution it delivers on the right.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
wrong.
correct is 
Horizon Control Plane - Centralized Management
On-Prem = Quick Provisioning
Horizon Cloud on Azure = Consumption-based pricing

Horizon Control Plane Services, delivered from a cloud-based single control plane, simplifies management and unifies Horizon environments across on-premises, hybrid and multi-cloud for the efficient deployment, management, monitoring and scaling of virtual desktops and apps.

I think the right answer is:
Horizon Control Plane - Quick Provisioning
On-Prem = Centralized Management
Horizon Cloud on Azure = Consumption-based pricing
Answer should be A since they have no room in their datacenter and will be heavy O365 users

questions.question_text:
A company will be deploying hundreds of desktops for temporary workers. The workers will be heavy Microsoft 365 users and require access to local USB, camera, and printers. The company is challenged with no spare capacity to support the deployment in their datacenter.
Which VMware solution can the company use to easily deploy the desktops, while keeping the base cost lower than other possible solutions?
